messages.title: BETTER RAIL LINKS FOR PLYMOUTH
messages.content: I've been campaigning for better road and rail links since I before I was elected as the local MP for Plymouth Sutton and Devonport - Oliver Colvile.

messages.title: PLYMOUTH SET FOR ROYAL MARINE BOOST
messages.content: As Parliamentary Private Secretary to the Ministers of State at the Ministry of Defence; Oliver was part of the team who assured the future of the Royal Marines in Plymouth. With extensive investment in new facilities based in the dockyard and HMS Raleigh; Plymouth is set to become a Super Garrison city.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for better road and rail links, improvement of rail services including faster trains and reduced travel times between London and Plymouth.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The city will see really positive changes in the coming months as 29 new, faster trains come onto service - cutting journey times by up to 14 minutes between London and Plymouth.

politicalExperience.role: Parliamentary Private Secretary to the Ministers of State at the Ministry of Defence
politicalExperience.achievements: Part of the team who assured the future of the Royal Marines in Plymouth, contributing to extensive investment in new facilities and turning Plymouth into a Super Garrison city.

images.caption: Oliver Colvile at the reopening of the Dawlish line
